fuel_loads_mmbtu_per_hour.note: This parameter is required to run REopt's GHP module but is not used to calculate URBANopt's GHP system LCCA. Users can set this to small numbers in GHP scenario

fuel_loads_mmbtu_per_hour.description: 8760 timeseries, if GHP not providing DHW set to zeros

load_kw.note: 15 min interval data do not work in GHP module. Please make sure all timeseries are 8760

require_ghp_purchase.description: choices of 0 or 1. Always set at 1 for URBANopt's LCCA

building_sqft.description: to calculate cost of hydronic loop
building_sqft.note: for the GHX iteration, set building_sqft to a number close to 0 but not exactly 0

peak_combined_heatpump_thermal_ton.note: in the GHX iteration, set this value to a number close to 0 but NOT exactly 0S

number_of_boreholes.note: in the GHP iteration, set this value to 0

length_boreholes_ft.note: in the GHP iteration, set this value to 0

yearly_total_electric_consumption_series.description: 8760 timeseries of building total electric consumption
yearly_total_electric_consumption_series.note: in the GHX iteration, set this value to a number close to 0 but not exactly 0

yearly_ghx_pump_electric_consumption_ser.description: 8760 timeseries of ghx's total electric consumption
yearly_ghx_pump_electric_consumption_ser.note: in the GHP iteration, set this value to 0

heating_thermal_load_mmbtu_per_hr.description: not used for URBANopt's GHP LCCA but required for formatting, set to number close to 0

cooling_thermal_load_ton.description: not used for URBANopt's GHP LCCA but required for formatting, can set as zeros

installed_cost_heatpump_per_ton.description: installation cost per unit (ton) of GHP

installed_cost_ghx_per_ft.description: installation cost per unit (ft) of GHX

installed_cost_building_hydronic_loop_pe.description: installation cost per sqft of building hydronic loop

om_cost_per_sqft_year.description: if not specified, the value is -$0.51, capturing saving from HVAC operation. Recommended setting at 0

macrs_bonus_fraction.description: Percentage of macrs benefits for GHP. Value between 0 and 1

macrs_itc_reduction.description: Percentage of macrs benefits for GHP. Value between 0 and 1

federal_itc_fraction.description: Percentage of ITC benefits for GHP. Value between 0 and 1

fuel_cost_per_mmbtu.description: to calculate BAU cost, and required for formatting in GHP scenario
